question: Which of the following is the correct description of “Jivi Kalp”, a term that was in news recently?
option4: a new type of fuel obtained from sea water
explanation: Jivi Kalp is an eco-friendly binding material. It is obtained from the locally available bio-resources. This aims to help in enhancing the rural economy by bringing down the cost of production of Agarbatti by approximately 60%. Besides this, the ICFRE has also identified 10 new plant species found good for Agarbatti making which are now being promoted through extension activities.
